title: Multi Step Form Need
snippet:
I currently have a form that collects email address, address information, and basic interests for collecting stamps. The form currently adds the lead information into Method.me. A multi step form is needed in order to make the potential lead feel like the process is short and simple instead of a long single form. The current form has a custom script attached in order to process a few of the fields into a customer id number. 
I believe the form should be built using AJAX and only POST once at the end of the last step. The form will be broken into 3 steps.
